result.longName: Shanghai Kindly Medical Instruments Co., Ltd.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Shanghai Kindly Medical Instruments Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of cardiovascular interventional medical devices in Mainland China, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company offers digital inflation devices; cardiac valves balloon inflation catheter; guiding catheter used to provide a channel for introducing balloon catheter, guidewire or other treatment devices; micro catheter to support the placement of guide wires; guidewire; angiography catheter used to inject and infuse contrast media and fluid; Y-connector pack used in PTCA surgery; inflation device used to inflate the balloon of dilating the vessel or placing the stent in the vessel; manifold for single use; and manifold kit. It also provides pressure bandage used to assist compression hemostasis; angiography syringe for single use; stopcocks used for pressure monitoring tubing during surgery; sterile seldinger needle used to puncture into the artery; pressure transducer for single use; extension tube for pressure monitoring; introducer set; joint intervention kit; introducer tool kit used in percutaneous vertebroplasty; and distal access catheter. In addition, the company offers medical accessories, such as check value, needle free connector, male Luer locks, bi-stopper, Heparian cap, flush device, flow regulator, and drip chamber assembly; other products, including disposable respirator, 3D medical surgical fask mask, vaginal dilator, foley catheter, infusion pumps, disposable automatic umbilical cord clamps, infusion connector and accessory for single use, and burette infusion sets without a needle. It serves medical device manufacturers and other customers. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Kindly Medical Instruments Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shanghai Kindly Enterprise Development Group Co., Ltd.

companyOfficers.name: Dr. Yuan  Song
companyOfficers.title: Deputy GM, Joint Company Sec. & Non-Exec. Director
